import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id : 1, data : '' } getId = () => { return this.props.location.pathname.split('/')[1] } shouldComponentUpdate(nextProps, nextState, nextContext) { this.setState( this.state.id = this.getId() , () => { if(this.state.id == this.getId()) return false } ) return true } componentDidMount() { } render() { return (
) } } export default PlayerSection
